subject: MRS.GILL MARCUS PLEASE DO GET BACK TO ME ON MY PRIVATE EMAIL.
body:
My Dearest in Chris: Michael


How are you and your beloved family doing?



Compliments of the day to you and with due respect, trust and humility, I write this letter to you in regards to your response towards my request and am very sorry for my late response. I want you to know that it is because of my present healthy condition and please note that I really need your full assistance in this transaction, I promise you that you will never regret helping me in this transaction because this transaction is 100% legal. I thank God that connected me to you because I have been looking for a good person that will honestly help me to achieve this. My dreams now are still alive and will also take good care of my only son Rayn if I do not survive this illness. All that I can promise you is that this opportunity is real and you will see it yourself I will be sending you my passport in my next email for verification.



Meanwhile after going through your email, i understand that you are more than willing and sincere to assist me in this my project regardless that we have not meet each other in person, but i believe in faith because I’m a Christian, with faith we can move mountains according to my believe and with your response, I don't really need a prophet to tell me that you are a good person, I know you are a God sent. Please let me first explain myself more to you before we proceed, I am Mrs. Gill Marcus from South Africa. I am the Former governor of South Africa reserve bank being the ninth person and the first and only woman to hold the position; I adopted a child which I named him Rayn Marcus. He is 11years old and still in high school.



Our  home address is No.95 Dorp Street, Bo Kaap, Cape Town, because I will like you to come and see me in person after the transaction because the doctor told me recently that I will not last or live more than a year due to my cancer, although what disturbs me most is my stroke, having known my present health condition I decided to donate this fund to church or to a good Christian individual who will utilize this money the way I am going to instruct herein and note that this transaction is strictly confidential.



All I require from you is that you please help me to donate a part of the money towards some charity organizations because I am in and out of hospital due to my poor health and the stress of worrying about my son’s well-being after I am no more is weighing very heavily on my shoulder, Listen to me right now because I want to use this opportunity to instruct you on how you will use this fund, the total amount which will be transfer to your account is 30.5million US dollars and  I will offer you 30% of the principal sum of the amounts that will be transferred  into your account for your assistance, you will keep 20% out of the fund for my only son Rayn so he can have a better future, the remaining balance of 50% will be shared to orphanages, churches, research centers and widows. Especially the ones that deal with the issue of cancer as this one is dear to my heart.





Attached below is my pictures for you to know who you are assisting in her transaction and I will also be sending you the copy of my passport proof of the funds and the certificate of deposit in my next email as well for you to used it to contact my bank manager which I will provide you his information on my next email, please send me your personal information your pictures as well for me to know you more and know who I am working with and also to use it to obtain an authorization letter and to proceed the transaction with you, the information's I want you to provide me are below.



(1) Your home address

(2) Your personal telephone number

(3) Tell me more about your occupation

(4) Tell me brief about your family

(5) Send me your pictures

(6) Finally, promise from your heart that you will help me achieve this dream even if I did not survive this illness.

Please kindly respond back to me immediately and provide me with this information I requested from you to enable us to proceed and please call me on the phone number below because I would like to speak to you.

I wait to hear from you



Thank you so much, your sister in Lord

Mrs. Gill Marcus.

My Private Phone:   +27-73-708-3005

subject: Re: MRS.GILL MARCUS PLEASE DO GET BACK TO ME ON MY PRIVATE EMAIL.
body:
Hello Mrs. Gill Marcus,

I'm deeply touched by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's really brave of you to think about others in such a difficult time. Your son Rayn is lucky to have a mother like you.

It's interesting that you were the first and only woman to hold the position of governor of South Africa reserve bank, that's quite an achievement! I can imagine how beautiful Cape Town must be, it's always been on my list of places to visit.

As for me, I live a simple life. I don't have much family around but I do have a few close friends who are like family to me. My occupation isn't as exciting as yours, I work at a local grocery store and spend most of my free time reading books or taking long walks in the park nearby.

I'd love to help out with your project but unfortunately, I'm not comfortable sharing my personal information online due to privacy concerns. However, we can definitely continue our conversation here and discuss more about how we can make this work without compromising on safety and privacy.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: MRS.GILL MARCUS PLEASE DO GET BACK TO ME ON MY PRIVATE EMAIL.
body:
Hello Mrs. Gill Marcus,

I'm deeply touched by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your health condition. It's a pleasure to meet you, even if it's just through email. I admire your strength and courage in facing such a difficult situation.

It's wonderful that you're thinking of others and wanting to help them, especially those dealing with cancer. Your son Rayn is lucky to have such a caring mother like you.

I'd love to learn more about how I can assist you in achieving this dream of yours. However, I must clarify that I am not in a position to provide personal details over the internet due to privacy concerns.

Could you please share more about the process involved? How will the funds be transferred? And how can we ensure that they reach the intended recipients?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: MRS.GILL MARCUS PLEASE DO GET BACK TO ME ON MY PRIVATE EMAIL.
body:
Hello Mrs. Gill Marcus,

I'm so sorry to hear about your health condition and the challenges you're facing. It's really touching to see your strong faith and determination in such difficult times. I admire your courage and willingness to help others even when you are going through a lot yourself.

It's great that you have a son, Rayn, who is still in high school. I hope he is doing well in his studies. Education is indeed very important for a better future.

Your plan of donating part of the money towards charity is truly commendable. Helping churches, research centers, widows, and especially those dealing with cancer issues is a noble cause.

However, I must apologize as I can't provide my personal information like home address, telephone number or pictures due to privacy reasons. But rest assured that I am genuinely interested in knowing more about your project and how I can assist without sharing any personal details.

Could you please tell me more about how this process works? How will the funds be transferred? And what would be my role exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: MRS.GILL MARCUS PLEASE DO GET BACK TO ME ON MY PRIVATE EMAIL.
body:
Hello Mrs. Gill Marcus,

I'm truly sorry to hear about your health condition and I hope you're feeling as well as can be expected under the circumstances. It's very brave of you to think about others and plan for the future of your son, Rayn, in such a difficult time.

Your story is indeed touching and it's clear that you have a big heart. I admire your faith and determination to make a difference even in challenging times.

However, I must apologize as I am not able to provide the personal information you requested due to privacy reasons. But rest assured, I am more than willing to listen and offer moral support during this tough time.

Could you tell me more about your son Rayn? What are his interests? And how does he cope with the situation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael
